page.title: 04 Gadgets In My Home
page.content: In my home I have various eletronic gadgets.Freezer,washing machine,cooker, television ect.... However apart from my sisters turntable we still lack a hi-fi and a video.Sometimes a video can be very good to have but sometimes if people publisise what they've got it can lead to a burglary.One element is the L.C.D display became when you go out,if you don't cover it up when it gets dark it covers the room in a emic glow. I myself have a portable TV,a radio cassette and a normal radio as well as a record player.I tend to like reading books beacause they contain more information than a TV.A recent fantasy called the Box of Delights it was much more interesting to read than to watch, even with the special affects.Books are still popular with me. D. Rog 12yrs.old
